name: Workprogress
query:
SELECT `tabHouseManagement`.user,
sum(
case
    when date_recieve is not null then
    1
    else 0
    end) as  recieved,
sum(case
	when date_recieve is  null and total_price is not null then
    1
    else 0
    end ) as notrecieved,
sum(case
	when date_recieve is  null and total_price is  null then
    1
    else 0
    end ) as notprocessed
FROM tabHouseManagement
join `tabHouseManaged` on 	`tabHouseManaged`.parent = tabHouseManagement.name
left join `tabHouse` On `tabHouse`.name= tabHouseManaged.house
left join `tabWater Usage` on `tabWater Usage`.month= %(month)s and tabHouse.name = `tabWater Usage`.house
group by user
report_script:
SELECT month,`tabHouse`.name ,`tabHouseManagement`.user, `tabWater Usage`.date_recieve FROM tabHouseManagement
join `tabHouseManaged` on 	`tabHouseManaged`.parent = tabHouseManagement.name
left join `tabHouse` On `tabHouse`.name= tabHouseManaged.house
left join `tabWater Usage` on `tabWater Usage`.month= '2024-01' and tabHouse.name = `tabWater Usage`.house

where `tabWater Usage`.total_price is not null or `tabWater Usage` .date_recieve is null   and  `tabHouseManagement`.user='bewphisit@gmail.com'
